description: Four of our hottest and toughest kombatants step into the Naked Kombat arena for our first live audience tag team match of the season! Fighting for the Blue Team, Landon "The Law" Conrad and his teammate Randall "The Rock" O'Reilly have proven their dominancy before when it comes to winning over their opponents and fucking their asses into submission. On the Red Team, with a powerhouse combination of speed and muscle, Marcus "Titan" Ruhl and Cameron "The Kin-Killer-Cade" are known for giving their losing opponents a brutal fuck once they win. No one wants to be humiliated and have their asses fucked in front of all the screaming fans, and since it's a live match anything can happen. After three intense rounds, the balls to the wall action continues into the sex round where it's an all out fuckfest as the losers submit to the winners, and the whims of the cheering crowd.
title: Naked Kombat's First Live Audience Tag Team Match of the Season!
